title: German conservatives win election but far-right AfD surges: exit polls
shortDescription: Germany's conservatives won the national election on Sunday, while the far-right Alternative for Germany came in second, its best ever result.

title: Trump administration purges military leadership
shortDescription: President Trump and Defense Secretary Hegseth announced they are replacing several top military officials linked to the Biden administration.

title: How Trump chose Dan Caine to be top US military officer
shortDescription: Caine, a retired F-16 pilot, will be promoted to four-star general, and then have to undergo a potentially grueling Senate confirmation process.

title: Trump, Maine gov. clash over transgender athletes
shortDescription: President Trump and Maine Gov. Janet Mills clashed over Trump's order banning transgender athletes from playing in women sports.

title: Judge blocks Trump DEI ban for federal agencies, contractors
shortDescription: A federal judge blocked President Donald Trump's move to ban diversity, equity and inclusion programs at federal agencies and contractors Friday.

title: Trump removes Joint Chiefs Chairman Gen. CQ Brown in military purge
shortDescription: Brown is among the senior military officials the Trump administration has linked to Biden-era diversity, equity and inclusion efforts.

title: Trump's deportations below Biden's, but poised to rise
shortDescription: Trump deported 37,660 migrants in his first month in office. Biden's monthly average was 57,000 for the last year.

title: For now, Supreme Court blocks Trump's firing of watchdog agency head
shortDescription: This was the first time the Supreme Court weighed in on the dozens of lawsuits challenging actions Trump has taken to reshape the federal government.

title: Trump removes Resolute Desk from Oval Office while being refinished
shortDescription: President Donald Trump temporarily removes the 150-year-old Resolute Desk from the Oval Office to be refinished.

title: AP sues White House over 'Gulf of Mexico' retaliation
shortDescription: The Associated Press sued Friday over restrictions to its White House access after it didn't adopt the administration's "Gulf of America" name change.

title: After calling Zelenskyy a dictator, Trump avoids label for Putin
shortDescription: Trump has been deeply critical of the Ukrainian president in recent days while offering friendlier words about his Russian counterpart.

title: Trump says he's considering taking control of Postal Service
shortDescription: President Trump said he's considering having his administration take control of the U.S. Postal Service and merge it into the Commerce Department.

title: DOGE told IRS to audit members of Congress? Not true | Fact check
shortDescription: While the claim originated on a satirical website, some social media users presented it as authentic news.

title: Proud Boys Leader Enrique Tarrio arrested at U.S. Capitol
shortDescription: Tarrio was at the Capitol to announce a lawsuit against the Justice Department.

title: Do Americans approve of Trump? What polls say a month into office
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has been in office for a month and his administration launched into a flurry of executive actions, court challenges and DOGE directives.
